ModMetaData.name: ToolBox
ModMetaData.author: Nif
ModMetaData.description: ToolBox is an XML based framework, designed for making mod settings that allow changes to ThingDef properties. Examples: cost, hitpoints, beauty, etc. It can also be used to provide a guide or information regarding your mod. It currently has 10 property widgets that can be applied to a ThingDef, and will continue to expand in the future.
